strongs_def: the body (as a sound whole), used in a very wide application, literally or figuratively
outline:
1. the body both of men or animals
    1. a dead body or corpse
    2. the living body
      1. of animals
    3. the bodies of planets and of stars (heavenly bodies)
    4. is used of a (large or small) number of men closely united into one society, or family as it were; a social, ethical, mystical body
      1. so in the NT of the church
    5. that which casts a shadow as distinguished from the shadow itself
